Package edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.particleFilter

Provides generic library for implementing a particle filter in any number and type of dimensions

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Measurer<P extends Particle> Given a list of particles, updates the likelihood weights of each of them based on new information
Resampler<P extends Particle> Rebalances the distribution of particles to reduce variance
Updater<P extends Particle> Evolves the model of the world forward in time in the absence of new observations
 

Class Summary
DeadReckoningGaussianUpdater Provides predictions of the future position of a particle by sampling from a gaussian velocity and heading distribution.
GaussianSample Reasonably fast sampling from an approximate Gaussian distribution
GSMRSSIRuntimeProvider Provides a real-time stream of GSM signal strength readings
ImportanceResampler<P extends Particle> Implements the importance resampling algorithm for 'focusing' the particles in the filter on the most likely candidates.
ImpossibleParticleResampler<P extends Particle> Throws away impossible particles (weight==0) and duplicates the rest with uniform random sampling to maintain the same particle count
NullMeasurer<P extends Particle> Trivial implementation of a measurer for testing purposes.
NullResampler<P extends Particle> Trivial implementation of a resampler for testing purposes.
NullUpdater<P extends Particle> Trivial implementation of an updater for testing purposes.
Particle Abstract class for a particle.
Particle2D Implementation of the particle class for a 2D real-valued particle.
Particle3D Implementation of the particle class for a 2D real-valued particle.
ParticleFilter<P extends Particle> Generic particle filter algorithm.
WifiRSSIRuntimeProvider Provides a real-time stream of wifi signal strength readings
 

Package edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.particleFilter Description

Provides generic library for implementing a particle filter in any number and type of dimensions
